name: 羅懷暐
objective:
探討工作研究涵蓋之各項技術：時間研究、動作研究、程序分析、作業分析、影片分析、工作抽查、標準工時與效率管理、動作經濟原理、生產線平衡、生產力衡量等。

The purpose of this course is to provide students with a resource which describes the techniques and procedures of motion and time study .It contains: techniques of methods study, work station design, PTS, stop watch time study, standard data, assembly line balancing.
schedule:
week 01：Work Study Overview 
week 02：Working Condition and Industrial Safety
week 03：Process Analysis 
week 04：Operation Analysis
week 05：Motion Study
week 06：Workplace and Tools Design
week 07：Stopwatch Time Study I
week 08：Stopwatch Time Study II
week 09：Mid-term Exam
week 10：Predetermined Motion Time Standard I
week 11：Predetermined Motion Time Standard II
week 12：Ergonomics Overview I
week 13：Ergonomics Overview II
week 14：Business Process Reengineering
week 15：Job Evaluation and Merit Rating
week 16：Value Analysis
week 17：Failure Mode and Effect Analysis
week 18：Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Final Exam：30%
Mid-term Exam：30%
Homework and quizzes：40%
materials:
1. 林清河，2007，工作研究，四版，台北：華泰
2. Freivalds (2014). Niebel's Methods, Standards, & Work Design. McGraw-Hill. ISBN：9781259010668.
